segments.text: Peeking into this kitchen illustration, it's full of details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is so engrossed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dish towel bunched up, her expression calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware of the sink flooding right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheet pouring over, drenching the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot in the puddle, slippery danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, through the squared window panes, a lovely garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children, boy climbing the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stretching to the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand reaching in, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sister below, palm up, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks—falling, slipping—make me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR
